GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v5.15.22
GSD.description:
net: macsec: Fix offload support for NETDEV_UNREGISTER event

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.22 by commit e7a0b3a0806dae3cc81931f0e83055ca2ac6f455, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit 3cf3227a21d1fb020fe26128e60321bd2151e922. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: macsec: Fix offload support for NETDEV_UNREGISTER event
